title: Save This June on Acupuncture, Marma, Massage & More! | CentreSpring MD
author: CentreSpringMD
description: Beyond the Exam Room With the mission of bringing holistic healing, we incorporate Traditional Chinese Medicine, Ayurveda and Mind-Body methodologies to every treatment plan. Now, we've created an environment just to experience these healing therapies in a dedicated space with highly trained providers. Relax, revive, and rejuvenate this summer with ultimate self-care than can transform you! Special [...]
cleaned_text: | | Cupping for Cellulite Reduction - Save $76 Using a targeted treatment and Epicuren's Espresso Limon Oil, has coffee to firm and citrus oils to detox and breakdown fat, our therapist will utilize cupping therapy to diminish the appearance of cellulite. Cupping applies negative pressure that lifts the skin, fascia, and subcutaneous fat layer away from the body. During June 2016, save on this treatment (regularly $125/session)! Purchase a package of three (3) sessions for $299 (saving $76). You will also receive a 10% discount on the Epicuren Espresso Limon Oil with your session These special offers expire on June 30, 2016.
